findings.title: Inconsistent Transfer Logic in Synth::transfer()/transferFrom()
findings.description: The ERC20-compliant token-transferring feature has an inconsistent implementation between `transfer()` and `transferFrom()` routines.

findings.title: Improved SignedSafeMath::mul() Logic
findings.description: The `mul()` function from the `SignedSafeMath` contract does not handle all overflowing cases when operating on signed integers.

findings.title: Improper Logic of Exchanger::calculateAmountAfterSettlement()
findings.description: The `calculateAmountAfterSettlement()` function has improper logic that can cause incorrect calculations of synth balance after settlement.

findings.title: 3.4 Explicit collateralKey Enforcement in CollateralShort
findings.description: The contract 'CollateralShort' does not explicitly enforce the use of 'sUSD' as collateral, which is strongly suggested.

findings.title: 3.5 Redundant State/Code Removal
findings.description: The `Horizon` protocol has unused code or unnecessary redundancies that can be safely removed. For example, in the `Exchanger` contract, there is a routine to calculate the dynamic fee for the given currency with an early exit condition checked twice, which can be simplified.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the Horizon protocol, there is a privileged owner account that plays a critical role in governing and regulating the protocol-wide operations, allowing an attacker to modify sensitive system parameters.

findings.title: Improved Logic of BaseRewardEscrowV2::accountMergingIsOpen()
findings.description: The helper routine of `accountMergingIsOpen()` can be improved by making an implicit assumption explicit.
